item.title: Biden signs AI order to allow energy resources to be built quickly for data centers, which could use up to 12% of U.S. electricity by 2028
item.description: Biden said the efforts are designed to accelerate the clean energy transition in a way that is “responsible and respectful to local communities” and d...

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg will cohost a Trump inauguration reception along with Republican billionaires
item.description: The other cohosts include Miriam Adelson, the Dallas Mavericks owner and widow of casino magnate Sheldon Adelson; and Tilman Fertitta, casino magnate,...

item.title: Stellantis exec says European carmaker was ‘anti-American’ when it messed with customers’ ‘freedom of choice’
item.description: Newly installed Ram CEO, Tim Kuniskis, says removing its Hemi-V8 engine made Americans feel like their freedom was being taken away.

item.title: Capital One sued by CFPB alleging bank cheated customers out of $2 billion in interest payments
item.description: Capital One said that it strongly disagreed with the CFPB's allegations and plans to “vigorously defend” itself in court.

item.title: Canada CEOs scolded in spat with Trump Administration: ‘You’re not serious people’
item.description: Also: SEC sues Elon over Twitter stock purchases, JPMorgan employees consider unionizing.
